entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023
